ygData.subject: RE: Freeport Cleric Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: What you have to understand is that by not at least trying to follow general grammatical guidelines that your point is frequently ignored or misunderstood.  If
ygData.messageBody:
What you have to understand is that by not at least trying to follow general
grammatical guidelines that your point is frequently ignored or
misunderstood. If you are going to spend the time to reply to a message,
you must feel that your response is of value so make sure it's understood.
Take 30 sec cut your message out paste it into a word processor then put it
back into the mail. I'm terrible at english but I want my point understood
so I take the time to check myself.

Fidan
-----Original Message-----
From: The Scotts [mailto:jtscott@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 9:27 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Freeport Cleric Quest


From: "The Scotts" <jtscott@...>

Jeez what happened did this board turn into a English class or
something so what my typing skills suck who really gives a damn everyone can
read it. Proofread no its just a message board Not an English class a
message board Get it?. got it...Thank you
